batch.name: Resume Website and API
batch.stack: CSS, React, Flask, Docker, Google Cloud, Google Domains
points: Built a frontend containing my resume with a counter for unique visitors using React and CSS
Built a containerized API using Flask and Docker
Instantiated a Google Cloud managed MySQL database for API use
Deployed the frontend to my custom domain with an SSL certificate
Deployed the API using Cloud Run and an API Gateway
Used a load balancer to route requests to either the frontend or backend service

batch.name: Landing Page
points: Created a simple landing page for my friend
Used React Router to handle navigating to different routes when navigation links are clicked
Used CSS for the stylization of the page
